item.description:
CANCELED DUE TO RAIN. Instead, we will have brunch at Doyle's in JP.
______________________________________________________


Join us on a stroll around the kettlepond. We can espy avians, uncover newts, debate the ethics of feeding the geese, and enjoy the autumn splendor. Bring your binoculars and your identification guides.

Any biologists in the crowd, please make it known if you'd be willing to help curate the walk.

We'll meet at the JP Licks on Centre Street in JP, which can be easily reached by bus or train. Car-drivers will find parking on the street and in nearby public lots. Early arrivers can grab a sundae or a coffee, depending on their predelictions. When we're all together, we'll walk the few blocks north to the water, and commence our natural philosophizing.

If afterwards we want to grab food as a group or in smaller clusters of nature-loving heathens, Centre Street is studded with popular options. Let us keep an open mind and play it by ear, as regards brunch.

For questions, please call: 617-935-4951.
item.name: Nature Walk around Jamaica Pond
